short_desc: Provides community work in lieu of jail time by court referral
description: Serves as an alternative to incarceration or paying large fines for low-risk offenders who meet specified criteria. Sentence may not exceed 30 days. Offenders perform 8-10 hours of work in-lieu of one day in jail. Participants are assigned  work at 1 of 30 contracted public agency work sites within Alameda County. Must be referred by the sentencing court.
